title: Introducing Australian football
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Australian Football Council, Frank Bagnall and Malcolm Smith
brief_description: The Victorian Football League’s 1972 Grand Final, between the Carlton and Richmond teams is the dramatic background used to explain the rules and techniques of play. Slow motion and free-frame techniques demonstrate playing positions, rules, penalties and the five types of kick employed.
